name: Dark King 0.01
description:
CONTENT INFO

This is version 0.01 

This version includes:

8 levels that appear at the beginning of the game in the world of Diggonium in a small area called Lesserias, which serves as an exile for the inconvenient… + minor mechanics 

This version does not include:

tutorial + inventory + skill/talent system + entire combat system + merchants + other locations + all mobs + story and more…

Keys:

space, up arrow == jump 

left arrow, a == left 

right arrow, d == right 

alt == shoot 

esc == menu 

delete == leave level 

R == restart level 

E/ENTER == confirm

Save

delete save ==> menu ==> delete saves (! proggresion can not be restored )

#!!! 6.4. 18:00 fixed problem with level 3

#!!! 6.4. 21:14 fixed problem with lights in level 4 and fixed problem with level 5 (portal direction)

In case of a problem/question you can contact me at radek.j.pokorny@gmail.com 

Have a fun!!
